groupAnonymizeConfirmation: KOKO: Wobɛtumi ama koro yi nyinaa post ne nkɔso nhintaw. Eyi bɛyɛ afei mfe 7, na ɛbɛma abrabɔ no abɛyɛde no nnafoɔ tumi pepa wɔn abrabɔ, wɔbɛma wɔn email. Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ saa?
groupDeleteContentConfirmation: KOKO: Wobɛtumi ama koro yi nyinaa post ne nkɔso pepa. Eyi bɛtumi ama daakye afei, wobɛtumi ama adi. Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ saa?
communityDeleteContentConfirmation: KOKROKO: Wobɛpepa abɔnten nyinaa wɔ saa kurow yi mu. Eyi bɛtumi atake to daakye, wobɛtumi afa adanseɛ a ɛbɛba wo nkyɛn. Wo pɛ sɛ wo toa so?
communityAnonymizeConfirmation: KOKROKO: Wobɛanonymize abɔnten nyinaa wɔ saa kurow yi mu. Eyi bɛba mu wɔ mfe 7 ma wɔn a wɔde abɔnten no bɛtumi apɛde wɔn abɔnten no, wɔbɛma wɔn email. Wo pɛ sɛ wo toa so?
communityDeleteConfirmation: KOKROKO! Sɛ wo pepa kurow no, abɔnten nyinaa, nnwom nyinaa ne nkɔmmɔde nyinaa bɛpepa. Wo pɛ sɛ wo toa so?

aiIconInfo: Wo bɔhyɛ no icon reyɛ, wo bisa to afei anaa tena so ma icon no beyɛ. Wo bɛnini so bisa sɛ wɔsan reyɛ icon no.
pleaseAnswerInThisLanguage: Mepa wo kyɛ fa kasa yi ka
aboutGroupPrivacyOptionsCreateGroupDirec: Sɛ ɛyɛ Public a, obiara a ɔwɔ link no betumi asɛm no. Sɛ ɛyɛ Private a, ɛyɛ adwene pa invite (firi email) na nnipa a wɔbɛbɔ akawnt na wɔwɔ invite link no nko ara na wɔbetumi asɛm no.
aboutGroupPrivacyOptions: Sɛ wɔde groups no bɛyɛ Open to community a, community no na ɛkɔm de sɛ ɛbɛyɛ public anaa private. Private groups yɛ invite (firi email) nko ara na nnipa a wɔbɛbɔ akawnt na wɔwɔ invite link no nko betumi kopa.
aboutStatusOptions: Featured, Active & Archived na ɛkasa ho kwan a groups no bɛda wɔ community no mu. Hidden groups nni hɔ wɔ community lists mu na wɔpam wɔn firi search engines mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛyɛ.
aboutStatusOptionsCreateGroupDirectly: Hidden groups nni hɔ wɔ community lists mu na wɔpam wɔn firi search engines mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛyɛ.
enableAiModeration: Ma AI Moderation Atoato ho kwan (hwɛ moderation prompt aseɛ no)
allowAnswersNotForVoting: Nnipa a wɔde asɛm bɛto no nnyɛ sɛ wɔbɛtumi voti ho
wikiSurveyActive: Survey no da so ma voti
confirmDeleteLogoImage: Wo yɛ sure sɛ wo pɛ sɛ wo paw logo no anaa?
confirmDeleteVideo: Wo yɛ sure sɛ wo pɛ sɛ wo paw video no anaa?
closeAndGenerateIconInBackground: To mu na ɛbɛsɔ icon wɔ akyire
rankedOrderInfo: Eyi ne amaneɛ a wɔde rank-ordered sɛnea ɛda so wɔ public voti mu
aiAnalysisInfo: Eyi yɛ analysis a GPT-4 bɛtoɔ no a ɛda so wɔ nneɛma ne voti mu
socialMediaCreateInfo: Name, description ne logo no bɛyɛ dɛ wɔde share wɔ social media so
generateAnswersInfo: Asɛm biara ɛsɛ sɛ ɛwɔ 3 nkarakrakra. Ma ho kwan ma ɛnnɛ 6 seed answers a, biara wɔ line bi mu, na ɛwɔ 140-nkarakrakra kɛseɛ.
aiAnalysisConfigInfo:
AI adwumayɛkyerɛ a ɛyɛ otomatik de wo LLM nkɔmhyɛ ase ma yɛn nkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ fa top N ne bottom N nkyerɛaseɛ. Ɛyɛ sɛdeɛ ɛda a, sistem no reyɛ nhyehyɛeɛ fa top 3 ne bottom 3 nkyerɛaseɛ ho pros ne cons. Wobɛtumi de nhyehyɛeɛ no to ase. Wɔn data fɔmati ne sɛ:

[
{ ideasLabel: string; ideasIdsRange: number; analysisTypes:
[
{ label: string; contextPrompt: string; }
]
}
]
newIdeasNotAllowedForVotingInfo: (*) Sɛɛhyɛn yi nkyerɛ nkyerɛaseɛ a ɛfiri ɔhɔho.
minimumTenVotesInfo: Nkyerɛaseɛ bɛyɛ adwuma wɔ ha sɛ wɔatumi aba dumienu votes.
minimumTenVotesToShowResults: Ɛsɛ sɛ dumienu votes sɛ wɔde kyerɛ wɔ nkyerɛaseɛ
allowAnonymousUsersToVote: Ma obi toto a ɔwɔ hwee
